screen.entitylibrary.title: Entity Library
screen.entitylibrary.tooltip.toggle_ids: Toggle displaying entity IDs in the list.
screen.entitylibrary.tooltip.toggle_sort: Toggle list sorting between name and ID (disabled in Recent view).
screen.entitylibrary.tooltip.toggle_favo: Add or remove the selected entity from Favorites.
screen.entitylibrary.tooltip.copy_summon: Copy a /summon command for the selected entity to your clipboard.
screen.entitylibrary.tooltip.copy_id: Copy the selected entity ID to your clipboard.
